column5: ** High quality, spacious units include kitchen & dining areas, TVs, and more. Enjoy this 2 bedroom condo at The Villages near Tyler, TX on beautiful Lake Palestine. (10 miles west of Tyler - 80 Miles east of Dallas) Amenities & Activities include: mini golf, horseback riding, spa, tennis courts, activity center with free Wi-Fi and planned activities for everyone. Minimum stay is four nights. Cannot book reservations more than 14 days in advance.
